Buchanan Law Firm, PC — Columbus, Georgia, Personal Injury Lawyers

From offices in Columbus, Georgia, the attorneys of Buchanan Law Firm PC, provide high-quality litigation services for clients in Muscogee County and throughout Georgia and Alabama. Founded in 1992, the law firm has grown to include a team of lawyers backed by a staff of highly qualified professionals. The firm's success has been built on the foundation of client service and a commitment to quality representation. Attorneys at the firm have extensive trial experience in personal injury and wrongful death cases and have handled a wide variety of cases such as:

  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Car, truck and motorcycle crash injuries and death
  • Injuries from defective and dangerous products
  • Medical negligence
  • Injuries caused by property owner negligence
  • Insurance claims and coverage disputes
  • Commercial litigation and business dispute resolution

Tenacious Representation Backed By The Highest Level Of Client Service And Communication Throughout Your Case

The firm's lawyers have significant trial and appellate experience and are licensed to practice in state and federal courts in Georgia and Alabama, including the United States Court of Appeals for the 11th Circuit and the United States Supreme Court.

Buchanan Law Firm, PC is a proud part of the local civic and legal community. The firm's attorneys take an active role in community affairs. The firm provides a free consultation and handles personal injury and wrongful death claims on a contingency fee basis. There are no attorneys' fees in such cases unless you recover monetary damages in a settlement or jury verdict.
